description:
This course is going to be about Facebook for business and we are going to explain that use in fact is more than posible to use this social media for your business strategy. We will start with "Why Facebook is so important". Why is so important to use Facebook for your marketing strategy and use it to boost your business. The focus of the course begins why meet Facebook tools and applications. We also will talk how you can engage users more. We will talk about more specific thinks like how actually create your post and will give you few tips what exactly you can include in them what you have state away from, get you know what usually engage the users, what's drive more attention to the posts and what users do not like. Will talk about for paid promotions and how to use them for your business.


The course include the following video topics:

1. Why Facebook is so important.

2. Facebook Tools and Apps.

3. Facebook posts, content and events.

4. Facebook tools.

5. Facebook ads and keywords.

6. Presentation Book.


A few word about the author of this course Dessislava Dobreva:

I believe that if a person can learn to get out of his comfort zone as much as possible, he will have incredible experiences and develop personally in ways that are otherwise impossible.

I am really passionate about two things - foreign languages & brand management

My greatest strengths:

- my motivation

- my ability to flourish in an international environment

- my writing & presentation skills

- the fact that I am convinced that life is 10% what happens to me and and 90% how I react to it.

Creating an E-learning for Ecognise in 2 languages, called "Turn your “don’t”-s into “do”-s: how to boost your business through social media". The product consists of videos, powerpoint presentations and articles on the forementioned topic, aimed at entrepreneurs who would like to better explore opportunities for promoting their business in Facebook, Pinterest, Google+, Twitter and Youtube.

And his motto is: “GET OUT OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE!”
title: The business side of Facebook
